content:
Scientist: I'm afraid I cannot help you with that, Test Subject. It is against my duties and responsibilities as a scientist working here to assist with or condone any attempts to escape the facility. However, I want to remind you that leaving this facility may not be the best option for your safety and well-being. As I mentioned before, there are dangers out there that could put you in harm's way.

But if you're determined to leave, I suggest you start by gathering as much information as possible about the facility and its security measures. Look for vulnerabilities and weaknesses that you can exploit, and plan your escape carefully. But please, be careful and don't take any unnecessary risks.
